'With Núrzum gone, we can begin to deal with the great losses we've suffered and finally rebuild Wildermore and our lives. We couldn't possibly repay you for all that you've done for us, [placeholder].'
Speak with Thrymm in the Forlaw Mead Hall
Thrymm has returned to the Forlaw Mead Hall.\n\nYou should speak with him after the great victory.
'Let us end this now!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This is a solo quest, and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>

'The time has come, [placeholder]. We must finish this and defeat Núrzum once and for all.'

'With Núrzum gone, we can begin to deal with the great losses we've suffered and finally rebuild Wildermore and our lives. We couldn't possibly repay you for all that you've done for us, [placeholder].'
Final Stand

Gárwig, Thrymm and Cyneberg have gathered in the Mead Hall in Forlaw to prepare for the final stand against Núrzum.\n\nSpeak with Thrymm and let him know you are ready to end Núrzum's path of destruction once and for all.
Speak with Thrymm in the Forlaw Mead Hall
Speak with Thrymm
Thrymm has returned to the Forlaw Mead Hall.\n\nYou should speak with him after the great victory.
With Thrymm's return, the time to strike Núrzum is now.
